de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.image
Class DateinamenZurueckUmbenenner

java.lang.Object
  de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.image.DateinamenZurueckUmbenenner
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class DateinamenZurueckUmbenenner
extends Object
implements Runnable

This class rerenames files in order to be able to play them back on a camera device that is not able to deal with long(er) filenames.

Version:
2004-01-08
Author:
hirsch, 08.12.2003

          Main constructor that takes a directory to work on.

          Checks whether current UI-configuration is valid in order to perform the renaming itself.

          Updates the UI and performs the renaming.
 void umbenennen()
          Performs actual renaming/removing of date information from the filenames.

DateinamenZurueckUmbenenner

                            throws InvalidDirectoryException,
                                   NoFilesFoundException
Main constructor that takes a directory to work on.

verzeichnis - Directory to perform operation on.
Throws:

Method Detail

umbenennen

public final void umbenennen()
                      throws RenamingErrorException
Performs actual renaming/removing of date information from the filenames.

Throws:
RenamingErrorException - If any error occurs.
See Also:
pruefeEingabeUndInit()

pruefeEingabeUndInit

protected final void pruefeEingabeUndInit()
                                   throws NoFilesFoundException,
                                          InvalidDirectoryException
Checks whether current UI-configuration is valid in order to perform the renaming itself.

Throws:
NoFilesFoundException - If the directory contains no files.
InvalidDirectoryException - If the selected directory is not accessible.

run

public final void run()
Updates the UI and performs the renaming. All error handling is done in other methods.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
